availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Prescott (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Sarah P'Pool Prescott in Trigg County, Kentucky, in September 1839. Father of Wilson Prescott, John C. Prescott, Sanders J. Prescott, Martha A. Prescott, Cassandra Prescott, Joseph F. Prescott, and Stokes Prescott. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 371A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 4.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film #000321335, p. 72.
